summary: invisible arms no more, no more excessive glare.
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.1 Fixed the display of the armor in the menu.

[img]http://img9.xooimage.com/files/6/3/7/low-3042baf.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img7.xooimage.com/files/4/2/3/low-2-3042bd9.jpg[/img]

I make a small contribution, in recent days appeared in Nexus put a mod for the armor of Triss Merigold,
but fails, to put on gloves with other armor arms disappear, it is overpowered, it replaces any existing
or maps are very bright.

I have fixed all this is now a half light armor, ready to enchant, hands do not disappear, nor excessive glare.

To add it to your console placing 
armor: player.additem xx0077ca 1 
Boots: player.additem xx0077cb 1 
Gloves: player.additem xx0077cc 1

Remember that the xx is the number of index of Nexus Mod Manager.

Thanks Fraper and Cd prject.
author: Jarodcastle
